title: Best Of (Packers/Bucs "conspiracy", Potential Lakers trade, LT on Parsons)
description:
00:00 Mike Evans was suspended by Jon Runyan Sr. ahead of game with his son. Packers guard Jon Runyan Jr. addresses “conspiracy” theories ahead of game with Bucs
16:23 Lakers in trade talks with Pacers. Should the Lakers go all-in on getting Buddy Hield and Myles Turner?
33:45 Lawrence Taylor reacts to Micah Parsons comparisons ahead of Giants/Cowboys on MNF
